task_summary: The robot must reach towards a towel located on a workspace, using visual perception and precise sequencing to safely approach the towel.

task_long_description.overview: A dual-armed robot operates in a tabletop environment with a towel spread across a green mat. The task is to reach (move the end effector above and toward) the towel. The sequence engages perception to locate the towel, then maneuvers above and aligns with the target before finishing in proximity. No grasp or manipulation is performed.
preconditions: Towel is visible and accessible on workspace.
Robot is initialized and ready to act.
stepwise_plan: Check if the towel is visible.
If not visible, perform up to three raster scan attempts to locate the towel.
Move the arm above the towel at a safe height offset.
Approach and align toward the towel to a moderate tolerance.
success_criteria: End effector is positioned above and close to the towel.
No collision or major deviation in approach.
failure_and_recovery: If towel not found after scanning, abort.
If location is ambiguous, repeat scan and detection.
If movement is obstructed, halt or retry.
task_long_description.termination: The tree terminates when the arm is precisely aligned and above the towel as specified by the final ApproachAndAlign node.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the towel is visible to the robot's perception system
Attempts up to 3 raster pattern scans to locate the towel
Detects and confirms the location of the towel
Moves the end effector above the towel at 10cm offset
Approaches and aligns toward the towel at 1.5cm tolerance

failure_modes: Towel not detected after scanning attempts
recovery_strategy: Re-scan and retry if perception fails
Pause sequence if motion error detected
assumptions: Instruction is 'Reach a towel' but no grasp, lift, or manipulation is required per visual evidence (robot stops above towel); thus, BT stops at approach rather than grasp.
Contact sheet shows only approach; no explicit evidence for grasp/transfer/manipulation.

expected_success_criteria: Arm is above towel within specified tolerance and offset.
